actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the project flood protection on the Souris River at Minot, N. Dak., to require the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to reimburse the designated non-Federal interest for certain additional expenses incurred by it as part of the project.

summary.text: Modifies the project for flood protection on the Souris River in North Dakota to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to reimburse non-Federal interests for additional expenses incurred in undertaking cooperation with the project. Stipulates that such reimbursement shall not exceed $250,000.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project flood protection on the Souris River at Minot, N. Dak., to require the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to reimburse the designated non-Federal interest for certain additional expenses incurred by it as part of the project.
